home.headline: Level Up Your
home.subheadline: Master personal finance through fun, gamified quests. Join 50,000+ users who are already winning with money!
home.join_community: Join thousands making smarter financial decisions every day
home.no_credit_card: No credit card required ‚Ä¢ Free forever plan
home.feature_1_desc: Turn boring finance into exciting quests with points, badges, and levels
home.feature_2_desc: Learn in 5-10 minute sessions that fit into your busy schedule
home.feature_3_desc: Apply what you learn immediately to improve your financial life
home.step_1_desc: Create your free account in seconds

features.gamified_desc: Earn points, unlock badges, and level up as you master financial concepts
features.track_desc: Monitor your financial journey with detailed analytics and insights
features.secure_desc: Your data is encrypted and never shared with third parties

testimonials.content_1: Finally, a finance app that makes learning fun! I've saved $500 in my first month.
testimonials.content_2: The quests helped me understand investing. My portfolio is up 15%!
testimonials.content_3: Perfect for teaching my kids about money. They love the rewards system!

home.testimonial_1: FinanceQuest made learning about money actually fun! I've saved $2,000 in just 3 months.
home.testimonial_2: The gamification keeps me coming back. My credit score improved by 100 points!
home.testimonial_3: Finally, a finance app that doesn't bore me to death. Highly recommend!

challenge.debt_avalanche_desc: Calculate how much you can save by paying off your highest interest debts first

challenge.payoff_too_long: Payoff period exceeds 30 years. Consider increasing payments.

challenge.budget_calculator_desc: Create a balanced budget following the 50/30/20 rule

challenge.expense_sorter_desc: Practice sorting expenses into Needs, Wants, and Savings categories

challenge.remember_50_30_20: Remember: Needs are essentials, Wants are nice-to-haves, Savings is for your future.
challenge.some_incorrect: Some expenses are in the wrong category. Check the hints and try again.
challenge.budget_unbalanced: Budget needs adjustment. Make sure your allocations equal 100%.
